body:
We've built and released our fourth betting Model in 2021; just in time to share **Australian Open Predictions**. 'You little beauty', as they say down here. This Model, developed by one of the sharpest sports betting data scientists in the industry, ingests dozens of tennis data sources to create probabilities for every tournament. From backyard ATP events to the Grand Slams. It distinguishes surfaces. So Rafa is going to have a different rating on clay than he is on the Australian Open hardcourt. We'll go into further details in the coming days, but let's stop wasting time and start reading the **Australian Open Predictions**. They'll populate every day of the tournament. - - - ## **Australian Open Mens Predictions** As you can see, we've just got the head to head proabilities today. We'll expand the basic UX in the coming days. And then by the end of the tournament, we should have some pretty sexy outputs. For now, we'll populate the picks, and below each table will be some value betting options that stand out.
### **Mens Daily Tennis Betting Tips** Comparing these outputs to the market, there's some serious discrepancies. We love Jannik Sinner as a decent underdog vs Denis Shapovalov. There's been good money on Sinner in the futures, so we're keen to ride that wave. Other standouts include: * **Corentine Moutet** to beat John Millman * **Yen-Hsun Lu** vs Reilly Opelka at huge odds (consider the + as well) * **Norbet Gombos** against Alex Bolt * **Damir Dzumhur** against James Duckworth * **Marcos Giron** is value against big name, Alexander Zverev * **Benoit Paire** against Egor Gerasimov Now let's analyse the Womens' outputs and markets. - - - ## **Australian Open Womens Predictions** Here's the head to heads, get the analysis below.
### **Womens Daily Tennis Betting Tips** * **Zarina Diyas** vs Tamara Zidansek * **Ysaline Bonaventure** vs Timea Babos * **Misaki Doi** vs Ajla Tomljanovic * **Veronika Kudermetova** vs Marta Kostyu * **Alison Riske** vs Anastasia Potapova * **Bianca Vanessa Andreescu** to smash Mihaela Buzarnescu Laura Siegemund is also value against Serena. Best odds are +600 but she's a 1 in 5 chance. - - - ## **Australian Open Mens Odds** We've also got the futures markets, showing you live probabilities of each market. Here's the mens: - - - ## **Australian Open Womens Odds** - - - #### **Want tennis predictions all year? Sign up for the Wednesday email.** #### **We promise it's worth your time.**
title: Australian Open Predictions: Your Daily Tennis Betting Tips
